input_text:
Job Title: Account Executive

Location: Tampa, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Who We Are...

Drive Social Media is one of the fastest-growing advertising technology companies in the country. Born out of necessity to provide the best return on investment for our partners, Drive Social Media has developed a cloud-based advertising management platform to achieve better campaign results and transparency while improving advertising efficiencies to stimulate revenue growth

We are looking for a self-motivated, outgoing Account Executive (AE) to manage digital ad accounts for up to 50 partners. As the key contact, strategy driver, and business consultant, tenacity is essential to both yield a return on investment, and to preserve the customer experience.

Self-awareness, active listening skills, critical thinking, a positive mental attitude, and a customer-oriented approach are vital for success in this role. The AE is expected to lead and control client meetings, to present with confidence and command, and to tactfully overcome client objections, all while building and maintaining a strong level of trust and respect with their partners.

The Account Executive is responsible for managing their own team of specialists who research, create, administer, and monitor bespoke digital strategies that drive a return on investment for our partners. As a contributor, an educator, and a marketing guide, using up-to-date best practices, and cutting-edge digital marketing strategies, the Account Executive is a true leader who extracts only the highest levels of service and expertise from their team.

Responsibilities

 Integrate, implement and maintain bespoke paid digital strategies for up to 50 small business clients, focusing on a tangible, scalable return on investment.  Build and maintain strong relationships with up to 50 small business clients, understanding and even anticipating their business and interpersonal needs.  Negotiate client advertising budgets and deliverable deadlines, justifying costs and schedules.  Overcome client objections when a request is based on feelings and not data in order to stay on track to achieve our ROI goals.  Defend the Drive Social Media strategy and process without damaging the client relationship.  Command your team, inspiring them to design thought-provoking, value-packed creative campaigns that drive revenue, keeping client standards, and the Drive Social Media process top-of-mind. A successful Account Executive will build a happy, productive, efficient, creative and motivated team who sees client success as their own. 

Requirements

The ideal candidate will have:

 3+ years of client-facing, or consulting experience.  3+ years of experience managing, inspiring, and developing a team.  3+ years of experience working with a variety of paid media channels, including; paid social, YouTube, display and paid search at a leading marketing agency.  Bilingual - Spanish/English  Outstanding interpersonal skills, with a genuine interest in and curiosity for human behavior and forging relationships.  Demonstrable experience with digital campaign planning and a solid understanding of marketing and advertising methods and techniques that yield a return on investment.  The ability to think adeptly around both creative and analytics, and an understanding of how they work together to drive a return on investment.  A strong grasp of performance media best practices.  Hands-on experience with digital ad platforms, including; Facebook Ads Manager and Google Ads. (Bonus points for experience with others such as Snap, TikTok, Twitter, and so on.)  Aptitude for working with and gaining insights from data.  Strong organizational skills and the ability to work within a process management system while also proactively identifying areas for workflow improvement.  Knowledge of Google Suite; working knowledge of SalesForce software is a strong advantage (but lack of is not a deal breaker).  A desire to work with some of the brightest minds in the industry. 

The Ideal Candidate Is

 A people person with a genuine desire to move the financial needle for small to medium-sized businesses.  Undeniably self-aware, and able to remain objective and positive through workday trials and tribulations.  Skeptical but not a contrarian. Thought-provoking questions that encourage respectful discourse are how we continually grow, and uncover the whole story.  A true leader who is not afraid to call out team inefficiencies to benefit the greater good.  Not a box checker. The Account Executive’s goal should be to drive their clients a return on investment, not to scratch a task off a list.  Curious and tenacious. 

Skills & Experience

 Real world experience as an Account Executive, or in a similar role.  Exceptional communication skills; verbal, non-verbal, and written.  Exceptional presentation skills, with the ability to guide the meeting, and all parties involved, to a desired outcome.  Proven experience as an Account Executive, or related position.  Strong knowledge of Google Suite and working knowledge of Salesforce and TaskRay. 

Why Drive Social Media…

Over the past 10 years, we’ve been keeping up with the massive shifts in consumer attention to online platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Amazon, and Google and we pride ourselves on comprehending and delivering the industry’s best practices and solutions to our partners.

Come join our 200+ employees at AdWeek’s Fastest Growing Agency, Inc. 5,000’s six-time award winner, and we’ve also been featured in Harvard Business Review, Forbes, AdWeek, NBC, Smart Insights, Glassdoor, NHL.com, Buzzfeed, Entrepreneur Magazine, Startup Grind, Business.com & Medium Business Journal.

To find out more about us, check out our Culture Insight Video: https://careers.drivesocialnow.com/

Benefits…

Eligible for full health, dental, vision benefits within the first 90 days of employmentDrive Social Media pays 100% of premiums for STD, LTD, and Life Insurance401k with up to a four percent match after your first full year at Drive Social MediaAgile and fast paced environmentParking not included - but we’ve done the research and can help you locate a spot!

Brand new offices…

Saint Louis’s office is outfitted with a hidden speakeasy (let’s see if you can find it)Miami has a gorgeous view in the heart of BrickellAtlanta office was recently built in January of 2021 in MidtownNashville’s spacious office is 2 blocks from Broadway & Assembly HallTampa's office overlooks the Gulf from the heart of the Westshore Business District

Drive Social Media does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
